class.name: PIXI.BlurFilter
class.help: The BlurFilter applies a Gaussian blur to an object.\nThe strength of the blur can be set for x- and y-axis separately (always relative to the stage).

public.name: syncUniforms
public.help: Syncs the uniforms between the class object and the shaders.

public.name: blur
public.help: Sets the strength of both the blurX and blurY properties simultaneously

public.name: blurX
public.help: Sets the strength of the blurX property

public.name: blurY
public.help: Sets the strength of the blurY property
